column5: cabin fever is starting early. I was wondering what is the best batter to use when doing mars bars. I know that y'all have the answer as to what to use & the perfect method to use ! Good Fishen Rob

Ingredients1 cup sifted flour1 teaspoon salt3/4 cup cold water1/4 teaspoon baking powder4 Mars or other caramel covered candy barsShortening or oil for fryingDirectionsMix flour, salt, and water until smooth, cover, and let stand at room temperature 20 to 30 minutes. Stir baking powder into batter. Place shortening or oil in a deep fat fryer, insert thermometer, and begin heating over high heat. Dip candy bars into batter, allowing excess to drain off. Fry in 375 degree fat until golden and crisp. Drain on paper toweling.
that sounds like a recipe for a heart attack
My recipe for any candy bar is.........tearing the wrapper off!
